tweet: Factoring plays a very vital part in the financing of the economy, both in the United States and on a global basis.
Factors & factoring companies provide their clients with cash by advancing on commercial Accounts Receivable and in some cases, inventory.
With factoring, the client can utilize the capital to expand, grow, and reduce potential credit losses.
Factoring is the purchase of commercial Accounts Receivables [AR] at a small discount to face value.
Asset based lenders also can be an important source of capital for entrepreneurial firms, by lending on fixed assets, and AR or inventory
